title: Road Rage/Aggressive Driving and Avoiding It

questions.question: Aggressive driving includes which of the following?
questions.explaination: The correct answer is d.  Speeding and lane blocking can both constitute aggressive driving.  While singing loudly can be obnoxious, it is not considered aggressive.

questions.question: You should use your horn in the following circumstance:
questions.explaination: The correct answer is b. You should only use your horn to prevent a collision. Using your horn in most other instances or to show frustration is inappropriate and often illegal.

questions.question: The best way to avoid frustration on the road is to:
questions.explaination: The correct answer is d. All of the above are helpful tips to avoid and/or prevent driver frustration.
